message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item holds immense value for us, and we believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its exceptional quality and rarity, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. We understand that this might be a significant investment, but we're confident it will provide substantial returns or benefits to you. Let's discuss how this opportunity can be mutually beneficial.

Alice, thank you for the offer, but $2000000 is significantly higher than my budget.  I'm really interested in this product, but I'm only able to offer $1000000 at this time.  This would be a great deal for both of us, allowing me to acquire this valuable item while leaving you with a substantial profit.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of its value. While we're grateful for your offer, we believe there's room for mutual benefit. Considering the rarity and quality of the product, we would like to propose a price of $1500000. This would allow us to achieve a satisfactory profit, while also making the product accessible to you within your budget. We look forward to your consideration of this offer.
